departments.name: engineering
departments.description:
Engineering Department has access to all the engineering channels in the server. Please read the rules and regulations of the server before posting anything.
**Important Guidelines** 
 1. Be respectful 
 2. Respect Privacy 
 3. Have Fun!
If you have any questions, please contact the @moderators.
We wish you a great time at Adomate!
